VEC.A: There are {5} slices in this pie chart.

SRP.A: The next slice clockwise from slice Discount Seeking is {Impulse Buying}.

SRP.A: The next slice counterclockwise from slice Discount Seeking is {In-Store Purchases}.

VPR.A: The 2024 with the largest proportion is {Planned Purchases}.

VPR.A: The 2024 with the smallest proportion is {Impulse Buying}.
